title: Surviving The Mongols: The Continuity of Ismaili Tradition in Ir
description: This lively study examines the poetic writings of NizÃƒÂ¥rÃƒÂ­ QuhistÃƒÂ¥nÃƒÂ­, one of the few Ismaili authors who survived the Mongol invasion of Iran in the 13th century.
